remark.en: *Core course. Students are required to take at least four courses from those marked with an asterisk (*) before being permitted to graduate.

goal.en: "The purpose of this course is to introduce the core knowledge of Construction Management, including construction industry, project delivery methods, procurement and bidding, organization and Leadership, schedule management, quality management, cost management, construction disputes and resolutions, construction and environment protections, ICT applications in construction management. This course helps students to have the basic knowledge to manage construction projects in the future."
goal.ch: 本課程教授營建管理的核心知識，包括營建產業介紹、專案執行、採購與招投標方式、專案組織與領導、專案時程管理、專案品質管理、專案成本管理、工程糾紛與處理方式、工程與環保、ICT技術在營建管理之應用等，以利學生日後可以具備管理工程專案的基本知識。

content.en:
"1.Course Introduction
2.Construction Industry and Project Participants
3.Organizing and Leading Construction Projects

10.Construction Planning and Control
11.Scheduling Techniques- ADM & Leveling
12.Scheduling Techniques- PDM & Leveling
13.Scheduling and Cost Management
14.Construction Dispute Resolution
15.ICT in Construction Management
16.Environmental Protection in Construction
17.Building Information Modeling
18.Final Examination"
